When in his [[Version 1|one-tailed form]], [[Naruto]] roars and causes an fire-like orb made of chakra,if it connects he slashes the opponent with his claws downward, then upward, then downward again,then leftward,then upward again to launch the opponent into the air. He then jumps into the air to slash the opponent away from himself. Using his [[chakra]], he forms a hand to grab his opponent, then pulls them back and finishes with a bone-shattering punch.

[[pl:Kyūbi no Chikara]]
